name: Adventures Of Pacman
description:
This game is a free to play game that includes aspects of the well known game Pacman.

The objective of this game is to score as many points as possible by consuming cherries (10 points) or gold coins (100 points).

You can also gain extra lives from consumption of cherries, but be warned every time you consume more food more ghosts (enemies) spawn. Items found by eating food can help get rid of these enemies. The ghosts can be moving and none moving enemies.

Controls

W- Forward

A- Left

S- Down 

D- Right
